android.permission-group.COST_MONEY.name: android.permission-group.COST_MONEY
android.permission-group.COST_MONEY.description:
Allow applications to do things
        that can cost you money.
android.permission-group.COST_MONEY.label: Services that cost you money

android.permission-group.MESSAGES.name: android.permission-group.MESSAGES
android.permission-group.MESSAGES.description:
Read and write your SMS,
        e-mail, and other messages.
android.permission-group.MESSAGES.label: Your messages

android.permission-group.PERSONAL_INFO.name: android.permission-group.PERSONAL_INFO
android.permission-group.PERSONAL_INFO.description:
Direct access to your contacts
        and calendar stored on the phone.
android.permission-group.PERSONAL_INFO.label: Your personal information

android.permission-group.NETWORK.name: android.permission-group.NETWORK
android.permission-group.NETWORK.description:
Allow applications to access
        various network features.
android.permission-group.NETWORK.label: Network communication

android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTRO.name: android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTROLS
android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTRO.description:
Direct access to hardware on
        the handset.
android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTRO.label: Hardware controls

android.permission-group.PHONE_CALLS.name: android.permission-group.PHONE_CALLS
android.permission-group.PHONE_CALLS.description:
Monitor, record, and process
        phone calls.
android.permission-group.PHONE_CALLS.label: Phone calls

android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS.name: android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS
android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS.description:
Lower-level access and control
        of the system.
android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS.label: System tools

android.permission-group.DEVELOPMENT_TOO.name: android.permission-group.DEVELOPMENT_TOOLS
android.permission-group.DEVELOPMENT_TOO.description:
Features only needed for
        application developers.
android.permission-group.DEVELOPMENT_TOO.label: Development tools

android.permission.SEND_SMS.name: android.permission.SEND_SMS
android.permission.SEND_SMS.description:
Allows application to send SMS
      messages. Malicious applications may cost you money by sending
      messages without your confirmation.
android.permission.SEND_SMS.label: send SMS messages

android.permission.SEND_SMS_NO_CONFIRMAT.name: android.permission.SEND_SMS_NO_CONFIRMATION
android.permission.SEND_SMS_NO_CONFIRMAT.description:
Allows application to send SMS
      messages. Malicious applications may cost you money by sending
      messages without your confirmation.
android.permission.SEND_SMS_NO_CONFIRMAT.label: send SMS messages with no confirmation

android.permission.CALL_PHONE.name: android.permission.CALL_PHONE
android.permission.CALL_PHONE.description:
Allows the application to call
        phone numbers without your intervention. Malicious applications may
        cause unexpected calls on your phone bill. Note that this does not
        allow the application to call emergency numbers.
android.permission.CALL_PHONE.label: directly call phone numbers

android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS
android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.description:
Allows application to receive
      and process SMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor
      your messages or delete them without showing them to you.
android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.label: receive SMS

android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS
android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.description:
Allows application to receive
      and process MMS messages. Malicious applications may monitor
      your messages or delete them without showing them to you.
android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.label: receive MMS

android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BRO.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BROADCAST
android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BRO.description:
Allows application to receive
      and process emergency broadcast messages. This permission is only available
      to system applications.
android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BRO.label: receive emergency broadcasts

android.permission.READ_SMS.name: android.permission.READ_SMS
android.permission.READ_SMS.description:
Allows application to read
      SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious applications
      may read your confidential messages.
android.permission.READ_SMS.label: read SMS or MMS

android.permission.WRITE_SMS.name: android.permission.WRITE_SMS
android.permission.WRITE_SMS.description:
Allows application to write
      to SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious applications
      may delete your messages.
android.permission.WRITE_SMS.label: edit SMS or MMS

android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH
android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH.description:
Allows application to receive
      and process WAP messages. Malicious applications may monitor
      your messages or delete them without showing them to you.
android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH.label: receive WAP

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.name: android.permission.READ_CONTACTS
android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.description:
Allows an application to read all
        of the contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious applications
        can use this to send your data to other people.
android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.label: read contact data

android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.name: android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS
android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.description:
Allows an application to modify the
        contact (address) data stored on your phone. Malicious
        applications can use this to erase or modify your contact data.
android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.label: write contact data

android.permission.READ_PROFILE.name: android.permission.READ_PROFILE
android.permission.READ_PROFILE.description:
Allows the application to read personal
        profile information stored on your device, such as your name and contact information. This
        means the application can identify you and send your profile information to others.
android.permission.READ_PROFILE.label: read your profile data

android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE.name: android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE
android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE.description:
Allows the application to change or add
        to personal profile information stored on your device, such as your name and contact
        information.  This means other applications can identify you and send your profile
        information to others.
android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE.label: write to your profile data

android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM.name: android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM
android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM.description:
Allows the application to access
        and sync social updates from you and your friends. Malicious apps can use this to read
        private communications between you and your friends on social networks.
android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM.label: read your social stream

android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM.name: android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM
android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM.description:
Allows the application to display
        social updates from your friends. Malicious apps can use this to pretend to be a friend
        and trick you into revealing passwords or other confidential information.
android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM.label: write to your social stream

android.permission.READ_CALENDAR.name: android.permission.READ_CALENDAR
android.permission.READ_CALENDAR.description:
Allows an application to read all calendar
        events stored on your phone, including those of friends or coworkers. A malicious application with
        this permission can extract personal information from these calendars without the owners\' knowledge.
android.permission.READ_CALENDAR.label: read calendar events plus confidential information

android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.name: android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR
android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.description:
Allows an application to send event invitations as the calendar owner and add, remove,
        change events that you can modify on your device, including those of friends or co-workers. A malicious application with this permission
        can send spam emails that appear to come from calendar owners, modify events without the owners\' knowledge, or add fake events.
android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.label: add or modify calendar events and send email to guests without owners\' knowledge

android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY.name: android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY
android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY.description:
Allows an application to read any private
      words, names and phrases that the user may have stored in the user dictionary.
android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY.label: read user defined dictionary

android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY.name: android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY
android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY.description:
Allows an application to write new words into the
      user dictionary.
android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY.label: write to user defined dictionary

com.android.browser.permission.READ_HIST.name: com.android.browser.permission.READ_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS
com.android.browser.permission.READ_HIST.description:
Allows the application to read all
        the URLs that the Browser has visited, and all of the Browser\'s bookmarks.
com.android.browser.permission.READ_HIST.label: read Browser\'s history and bookmarks

com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HIS.name: com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS
com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HIS.description:
Allows an application to modify the
        Browser\'s history or bookmarks stored on your phone. Malicious applications
        can use this to erase or modify your Browser\'s data.
com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HIS.label: write Browser\'s history and bookmarks

com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM.name: com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM
com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM.description:
Allows the application to set an alarm in
      an installed alarm clock application. Some alarm clock applications may
      not implement this feature.
com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM.label: set alarm in alarm clock

com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.name: com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOICEMAIL
com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.description:
Allows the application to add messages
      to your voicemail inbox.
com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.label: add voicemail

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.name: android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description:
Access fine location sources such as the
        Global Positioning System on the phone, where available.
        Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are, and may
        consume additional battery power.
android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.label: fine (GPS) location

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.name: android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description:
Access coarse location sources such as the cellular
        network database to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious
        applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.
android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.label: coarse (network-based) location

android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION.name: android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION.description:
Create mock location sources for testing.
        Malicious applications can use this to override the location and/or status returned by real
        location sources such as GPS or Network providers.
android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION.label: mock location sources for testing

android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA.name: android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA_COMMANDS
android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA.description:
Access extra location provider commands.
        Malicious applications could use this to interfere with the operation of the GPS
        or other location sources.
android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA.label: access extra location provider commands

android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROV.name: android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROVIDER
android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROV.description:
Create mock location sources for testing.
        Malicious applications can use this to override the location and/or status returned by real
        location sources such as GPS or Network providers or monitor and report your location to an external source.
android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROV.label: permission to install a location provider

android.permission.INTERNET.name: android.permission.INTERNET
android.permission.INTERNET.description:
Allows an application to
      create network sockets.
android.permission.INTERNET.label: full Internet access

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.name: android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description:
Allows an application to view
      the state of all networks.
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.label: view network state

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.name: android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description:
Allows an application to view
      the information about the state of Wi-Fi.
android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.label: view Wi-Fi state

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH
android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description:
Allows an application to view
      configuration of the local Bluetooth phone, and to make and accept
      connections with paired devices.
android.permission.BLUETOOTH.label: create Bluetooth connections

android.permission.NFC.name: android.permission.NFC
android.permission.NFC.description:
Allows an application to communicate
      with Near Field Communication (NFC) tags, cards, and readers.
android.permission.NFC.label: control Near Field Communication

android.permission.USE_SIP.name: android.permission.USE_SIP
android.permission.USE_SIP.description: Allows an application to use the SIP service to make/receive Internet calls.
android.permission.USE_SIP.label: make/receive Internet calls

android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER.name: android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER
android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER.description:
Allows an
    application to make calls to AccountAuthenticators
android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER.label: act as the AccountManagerService

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.name: android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS
android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.description:
Allows an application to get
      the list of accounts known by the phone.
android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.label: discover known accounts

android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.name: android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS
android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.description:
Allows an application
    to use the account authenticator capabilities of the
    AccountManager, including creating accounts and getting and
    setting their passwords.
android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.label: act as an account authenticator

android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.name: android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.description:
Allows an application to
    request authentication tokens.
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.label:
use the authentication
    credentials of an account

android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.name: android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS
android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.description:
Allows an application to
    perform operations like adding, and removing accounts and deleting
    their password.
android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.label: manage the accounts list

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS
android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.description:
Allows application to modify
        global audio settings such as volume and routing.
android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.label: change your audio settings

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.name: android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO
android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description:
Allows application to access
        the audio record path.
android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.label: record audio

android.permission.CAMERA.name: android.permission.CAMERA
android.permission.CAMERA.description:
Allows application to take pictures and videos
        with the camera. This allows the application at any time to collect
        images the camera is seeing.
android.permission.CAMERA.label: take pictures and videos

android.permission.VIBRATE.name: android.permission.VIBRATE
android.permission.VIBRATE.description:
Allows the application to control
        the vibrator.
android.permission.VIBRATE.label: control vibrator

android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.name: android.permission.FLASHLIGHT
android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.description:
Allows the application to control
        the flashlight.
android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.label: control flashlight

android.permission.MANAGE_USB.name: android.permission.MANAGE_USB
android.permission.MANAGE_USB.description: Allows the application to manage preferences and permissions for USB devices.
android.permission.MANAGE_USB.label: manage preferences and permissions for USB devices

android.permission.ACCESS_MTP.name: android.permission.ACCESS_MTP
android.permission.ACCESS_MTP.description: Allows access to the kernel MTP driver to implement the MTP USB protocol.
android.permission.ACCESS_MTP.label: implement MTP protocol

android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST.name: android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST
android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST.description:
Allows the application to control
        various peripherals for the purpose of hardware testing.
android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST.label: test hardware

android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.name: android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS
android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.description:
Allows application to
        process outgoing calls and change the number to be dialed.  Malicious
        applications may monitor, redirect, or prevent outgoing calls.
android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.label: intercept outgoing calls

android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.name: android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE
android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.description:
Allows the application to control the
        phone features of the device. An application with this permission can switch
        networks, turn the phone radio on and off and the like without ever notifying
        you.
android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.label: modify phone state

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.name: android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE
android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description:
Allows the application to access the phone
        features of the device.  An application with this permission can determine the phone
        number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call
        is connected to and the like.
android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.label: read phone state and identity

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.name: android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.
android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.label: modify/delete SD card contents

android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE.name: android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE
android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to modify the contents of the internal media storage.
android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE.label: modify/delete internal media storage contents

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS
android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.description:
Allows an application to modify the
        system\'s settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system\'s
        configuration.
android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.label: modify global system settings

android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.description:
Allows an application to modify the
        system\'s secure settings data. Not for use by normal applications.
android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.label: modify secure system settings

android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES.name: android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES
android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES.description:
Allows an application to modify the
        Google services map.  Not for use by normal applications.
android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES.label: modify the Google services map

android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.name: android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR
android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.description:
Allows application to
        expand or collapse the status bar.
android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.label: expand/collapse status bar

android.permission.GET_TASKS.name: android.permission.GET_TASKS
android.permission.GET_TASKS.description:
Allows application to retrieve
        information about currently and recently running tasks. May allow
        malicious applications to discover private information about other applications.
android.permission.GET_TASKS.label: retrieve running applications

android.permission.REORDER_TASKS.name: android.permission.REORDER_TASKS
android.permission.REORDER_TASKS.description:
Allows an application to move
        tasks to the foreground and background. Malicious applications can force
        themselves to the front without your control.
android.permission.REORDER_TASKS.label: reorder running applications

android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS.name: android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS
android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS.description:
Allows an application to remove
        tasks and kill their applications. Malicious applications can disrupt
        the behavior of other applications.
android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS.label: stop running applications

android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.name: android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION
android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.description:
Allows an application to
        change the current configuration, such as the locale or overall font
        size.
android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.label: change your UI settings

android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES.name: android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES
android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES.description:
Allows an application to
        kill background processes of other applications, even if memory
        isn\'t low.
android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES.label: kill background processes

android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCE.name: android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES
android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCE.description:
Allows an application to
        kill background processes of other applications, even if memory
        isn\'t low.
android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCE.label: kill background processes

android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES.name: android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES
android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES.description:
Allows an application to
        forcibly stop other applications.
android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES.label: force stop other applications

android.permission.DUMP.name: android.permission.DUMP
android.permission.DUMP.description:
Allows application to retrieve
        internal state of the system. Malicious applications may retrieve
        a wide variety of private and secure information that they should
        never normally need.
android.permission.DUMP.label: retrieve system internal state

android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTE.name: android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTENT
android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTE.description:
Allows application to retrieve
        the content of the active window. Malicious applications may retrieve
        the entire window content and examine all its text except passwords.
android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTE.label: retrieve screen content

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.name: android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW
android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description:
Allows an application to
        show system alert windows. Malicious applications can take over the
        entire screen.
android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.label: display system-level alerts

android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE.name: android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE
android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE.description:
Allows an application to change
        the global animation speed (faster or slower animations) at any time.
android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE.label: modify global animation speed

android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY.name: android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY
android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY.description:
Allows an application to make
        parts of itself persistent, so the system can\'t use it for other
        applications.
android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY.label: make application always run

android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE.name: android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE
android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE.description:
Allows an application to retrieve
        its code, data, and cache sizes
android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE.label: measure application storage space

android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICA.name: android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICATIONS
android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICA.description:
Allows an application to
        modify your preferred applications. This can allow malicious applications
        to silently change the applications that are run, spoofing your
        existing applications to collect private data from you.
android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICA.label: set preferred applications

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED
android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description:
Allows an application to
        have itself started as soon as the system has finished booting.
        This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the
        application to slow down the overall phone by always running.
android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.label: automatically start at boot

android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY
android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY.description:
Allows an application to send
        sticky broadcasts, which remain after the broadcast ends.
        Malicious applications can make the phone slow or unstable by causing it
        to use too much memory.
android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY.label: send sticky broadcast

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.name: android.permission.WAKE_LOCK
android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description:
Allows an application to prevent
        the phone from going to sleep.
android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.label: prevent phone from sleeping

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.name: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER
android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.description:
Allows the application
        to set the system wallpaper.
android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.label: set wallpaper

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.name: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS
android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.description:
Allows the application
        to set the system wallpaper size hints.
android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.label: set wallpaper size hints

android.permission.SET_TIME.name: android.permission.SET_TIME
android.permission.SET_TIME.description:
Allows an application to change
        the phone\'s clock time.
android.permission.SET_TIME.label: set time

android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE.name: android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE
android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE.description:
Allows an application to change
        the phone\'s time zone.
android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE.label: set time zone

android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYS.name: android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS
android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYS.description:
Allows the application to mount and
        unmount filesystems for removable storage.
android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYS.label: mount and unmount filesystems

android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYST.name: android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYSTEMS
android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYST.description: Allows the application to format removable storage.
android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYST.label: format external storage

android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS.name: android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS
android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS.description: Allows the application to get information on internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS.label: get information on internal storage

android.permission.ASEC_CREATE.name: android.permission.ASEC_CREATE
android.permission.ASEC_CREATE.description: Allows the application to create internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_CREATE.label: create internal storage

android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY.name: android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY
android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY.description: Allows the application to destroy internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY.label: destroy internal storage

android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT.name: android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT
android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT.description: Allows the application to mount / unmount internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT.label: mount / unmount internal storage

android.permission.ASEC_RENAME.name: android.permission.ASEC_RENAME
android.permission.ASEC_RENAME.description: Allows the application to rename internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_RENAME.label: rename internal storage

android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.name: android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD
android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.description:
Allows an application to disable
      the keylock and any associated password security. A legitimate example of
      this is the phone disabling the keylock when receiving an incoming phone call,
      then re-enabling the keylock when the call is finished.
android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.label: disable keylock

android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS
android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.description:
Allows an application to read the sync settings,
        such as whether sync is enabled for Contacts.
android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.label: read sync settings

android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS
android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.description:
Allows an application to modify the sync
        settings, such as whether sync is enabled for Contacts.
android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.label: write sync settings

android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS.name: android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS
android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS.description:
Allows an application to read the sync stats; e.g., the
        history of syncs that have occurred.
android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS.label: read sync statistics

android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS
android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.description:
Allows an application to change network settings and to intercept and inspect all network traffic,
      for example to change the proxy and port of any APN. Malicious applications could monitor, redirect, or modify network
      packets without your knowledge.
android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.label: change/intercept network settings and traffic

android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ.name: android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ
android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ.description: Allows an application to get details about the currently synced feeds.
android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ.label: read subscribed feeds

android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRIT.name: android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRITE
android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRIT.description:
Allows an application to modify
      your currently synced feeds. This could allow a malicious application to
      change your synced feeds.
android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRIT.label: write subscribed feeds

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.name: android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.description:
Allows an application to change
      the state of network connectivity.
android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.label: change network connectivity

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.name: android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description:
Allows an application to connect
      to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points, and to make changes to
      configured Wi-Fi networks.
android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.label: change Wi-Fi state

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST.name: android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST.description:
Allows an application to
      receive packets not directly addressed to your device.  This can be
      useful when discovering services offered near by.  It uses more power
      than the non-multicast mode.
android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST.label:
allow Wi-Fi Multicast
      reception

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN
android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description:
Allows an application to configure
      the local Bluetooth phone, and to discover and pair with remote
      devices.
android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.label: bluetooth administration

android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE.name: android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE
android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE.description:
Allows an application to free phone storage
        by deleting files in application cache directory. Access is very
        restricted usually to system process.
android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE.label: delete all application cache data

android.permission.READ_LOGS.name: android.permission.READ_LOGS
android.permission.READ_LOGS.description:
Allows an application to read from the
        system\'s various log files.  This allows it to discover general
        information about what you are doing with the phone, potentially
        including personal or private information.
android.permission.READ_LOGS.label: read sensitive log data

android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP.name: android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP
android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP.description:
Allows an application to turn
        on debugging for another application. Malicious applications can use this
        to kill other applications.
android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP.label: enable application debugging

android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.name: android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT
android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.description:
Allows an application
        to control the maximum number of processes that will run. Never
        needed for normal applications.
android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.label: limit number of running processes

android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.name: android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH
android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.description:
Allows an application
        to control whether activities are always finished as soon as they
        go to the background. Never needed for normal applications.
android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.label: make all background applications close

android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PRO.name: android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PROCESSES
android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PRO.description:
Allows application to request that the
        supplied signal be sent to all persistent processes.
android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PRO.label: send Linux signals to applications

android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC.name: android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC
android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC.description:
Allows an application to read and write to
    any resource owned by the diag group; for example, files in /dev. This could
    potentially affect system stability and security. This should be ONLY be used
    for hardware-specific diagnostics by the manufacturer or operator.
android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC.label: read/write to resources owned by diag

android.permission.STATUS_BAR.name: android.permission.STATUS_BAR
android.permission.STATUS_BAR.description:
Allows application to disable
        the status bar or add and remove system icons.
android.permission.STATUS_BAR.label: disable or modify status bar

android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE.name: android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE
android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE.description: Allows the application to be the status bar.
android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE.label: status bar

android.permission.FORCE_BACK.name: android.permission.FORCE_BACK
android.permission.FORCE_BACK.description:
Allows an application to force any
        activity that is in the foreground to close and go back.
        Should never be needed for normal applications.
android.permission.FORCE_BACK.label: force application to close

android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.name: android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS
android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.description:
Allows the modification of
        collected battery statistics. Not for use by normal applications.
android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.label: modify battery statistics

android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDO.name: android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDOW
android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDO.description:
Allows the creation of
        windows that are intended to be used by the internal system
        user interface. Not for use by normal applications.
android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDO.label: display unauthorized windows

android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS.name: android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS
android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS.description:
Allows applications to
        create and manage their own tokens, bypassing their normal
        Z-ordering. Should never be needed for normal applications.
android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS.label: manage application tokens

android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS.name: android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS
android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS.description:
Allows an application to deliver
        its own input events (key presses, etc.) to other applications. Malicious
        applications can use this to take over the phone.
android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS.label: press keys and control buttons

android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER.name: android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER
android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER.description:
Allows an application to
        monitor and control how the system launches activities.
        Malicious applications may completely compromise the system. This
        permission is only needed for development, never for normal
        use.
android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER.label: monitor and control all application launching

android.permission.SHUTDOWN.name: android.permission.SHUTDOWN
android.permission.SHUTDOWN.description:
Puts the activity manager into a shutdown
        state.  Does not perform a complete shutdown.
android.permission.SHUTDOWN.label: partial shutdown

android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES.name: android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES
android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES.description:
Prevents the user from switching to
        another application.
android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES.label: prevent app switches

android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE.name: android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE
android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE.description:
Allows applications to watch the
        keys you press even when interacting with another application (such
        as entering a password). Should never be needed for normal applications.
android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE.label: record what you type and actions you take

android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD.name: android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD
android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of an input method. Should never be needed for normal applications.
android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD.label: bind to an input method

android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.name: android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a text service(e.g. SpellCheckerService). Should never be needed for normal applications.
android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.label: bind to a text service

android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE.name: android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a Vpn service. Should never be needed for normal applications.
android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE.label: bind to a VPN service

android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER.name: android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER
android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a wallpaper. Should never be needed for normal applications.
android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER.label: bind to a wallpaper

android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN.name: android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN
android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN.description:
Allows the holder to send intents to
        a device administrator. Should never be needed for normal applications.
android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN.label: interact with a device admin

android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION.name: android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION
android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION.description:
Allows an application to change
        the rotation of the screen at any time. Should never be needed for
        normal applications.
android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION.label: change screen orientation

android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED.name: android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED
android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED.description:
Allows an application to change
        the mouse or trackpad pointer speed at any time. Should never be needed for
        normal applications.
android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED.label: change pointer speed

android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES.name: android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES
android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES.description:
Allows an application to install new or updated
        Android packages. Malicious applications can use this to add new applications with arbitrarily
        powerful permissions.
android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES.label: directly install applications

android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA.name: android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA
android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA.description: Allows an application to clear user data.
android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA.label: delete other applications\' data

android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES.name: android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES
android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES.description:
Allows an application to delete
        cache files.
android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES.label: delete other applications\' caches

android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES.name: android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES
android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES.description:
Allows an application to delete
        Android packages. Malicious applications can use this to delete important applications.
android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES.label: delete applications

android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE.name: android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE
android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE.description: Allows an application to move application resources from internal to external media and vice versa.
android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE.label: Move application resources

android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENAB.name: android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENAB.description:
Allows an application to change whether a
        component of another application is enabled or not. Malicious applications can use this
        to disable important phone capabilities. Care must be used with this permission, as it is
        possible to get application components into an unusable, inconsistent, or unstable state.
android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENAB.label: enable or disable application components

android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGE.name: android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGER
android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGE.description:
Allows application to use
        SurfaceFlinger low-level features.
android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGE.label: access SurfaceFlinger

android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER.name: android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER
android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER.description:
Allows application to
        read the content of the frame buffer.
android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER.label: read frame buffer

android.permission.BRICK.name: android.permission.BRICK
android.permission.BRICK.description:
Allows the application to
        disable the entire phone permanently. This is very dangerous.
android.permission.BRICK.label: permanently disable phone

android.permission.REBOOT.name: android.permission.REBOOT
android.permission.REBOOT.description:
Allows the application to
        force the phone to reboot.
android.permission.REBOOT.label: force phone reboot

android.permission.DEVICE_POWER.name: android.permission.DEVICE_POWER
android.permission.DEVICE_POWER.description:
Allows the application to turn the
        phone on or off.
android.permission.DEVICE_POWER.label: power phone on or off

android.permission.FACTORY_TEST.name: android.permission.FACTORY_TEST
android.permission.FACTORY_TEST.description:
Run as a low-level manufacturer test,
        allowing complete access to the phone hardware. Only available
        when a phone is running in manufacturer test mode.
android.permission.FACTORY_TEST.label: run in factory test mode

android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REM.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REMOVED
android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REM.description:
Allows an application to
        broadcast a notification that an application package has been removed.
        Malicious applications may use this to kill any other running
        application.
android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REM.label: send package removed broadcast

android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS
android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS.description:
Allows an application to
        broadcast a notification that an SMS message has been received.
        Malicious applications may use this to forge incoming SMS messages.
android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS.label: send SMS-received broadcast

android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH
android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH.description:
Allows an application to
        broadcast a notification that a WAP PUSH message has been received.
        Malicious applications may use this to forge MMS message receipt or to
        silently replace the content of any web page with malicious variants.
android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH.label: send WAP-PUSH-received broadcast

android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR.name: android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR
android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR.description:
Allows an application to completely
        reset the system to its factory settings, erasing all data,
        configuration, and installed applications.
android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR.label: reset system to factory defaults

android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.name: android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED
android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.description:
Allows the application to call
        any phone number, including emergency numbers, without your intervention.
        Malicious applications may place unnecessary and illegal calls to emergency
        services.
android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.label: directly call any phone numbers

android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIO.name: android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIONING
android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIO.description:
Allows the application to start CDMA provisioning.
        Malicious applications may unnecessarily start CDMA provisioning
android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIO.label: directly start CDMA phone setup

android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDA.name: android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDATES
android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDA.description:
Allows enabling/disabling location
        update notifications from the radio.  Not for use by normal applications.
android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDA.label: control location update notifications

android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPER.name: android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPERTIES
android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPER.description:
Allows read/write access to
        properties uploaded by the checkin service.  Not for use by normal
        applications.
android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPER.label: access checkin properties

android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS.name: android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS
android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS.description: Allows the modification of collected component usage statistics. Not for use by normal applications.
android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS.label: update component usage statistics

android.permission.BATTERY_STATS.name: android.permission.BATTERY_STATS
android.permission.BATTERY_STATS.description:
Allows the modification of
        collected battery statistics. Not for use by normal applications.
android.permission.BATTERY_STATS.label: modify battery statistics

android.permission.BACKUP.name: android.permission.BACKUP
android.permission.BACKUP.description: Allows the application to control the system\'s backup and restore mechanism.  Not for use by normal applications.
android.permission.BACKUP.label: control system backup and restore

android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP.name: android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP
android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP.description: Allows the application to launch the full backup confirmation UI.  Not to be used by any application.
android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP.label: confirm a full backup or restore operation

android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.name: android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS
android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a widget service. Should never be needed for normal applications.
android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.label: bind to a widget service

android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET.name: android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET
android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET.description:
Allows the application to tell the system
        which widgets can be used by which application.  With this permission,
        applications can give access to personal data to other applications.
        Not for use by normal applications.
android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET.label: choose widgets

android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DAT.name: android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DATA_SETTING
android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DAT.description:
Allows an application to change
      the background data usage setting.
android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DAT.label: change background data usage setting

android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYST.name: android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYSTEM
android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYST.description: Allows an application to read and write the cache filesystem.
android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYST.label: access the cache filesystem

android.permission.COPY_PROTECTED_DATA.name: android.permission.COPY_PROTECTED_DATA
android.permission.COPY_PROTECTED_DATA.description: Allows to invoke default container service to copy content. Not for use by normal applications.
android.permission.COPY_PROTECTED_DATA.label: Allows to invoke default container service to copy content. Not for use by normal applications.

android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HI.name: android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HISTORY
android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HI.description: Allows an application to read historical network usage for specific networks and applications.
android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HI.label: read historical network usage

android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY.name: android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY
android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY.description: Allows an application to manage network policies and define application-specific rules.
android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY.label: manage network policy

android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUN.name: android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUNTING
android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUN.description: Allows modification of how network usage is accounted against applications. Not for use by normal applications.
android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUN.label: modify network usage accounting

android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_.name: android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_AGENT
android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_.description:
Allows the application to verify a package is
        installable.
android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_.label: verify packages

android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER.name: android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER
android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER.description:
Allows the holder to make requests of
        package verifiers. Should never be needed for normal applications.
android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER.label: bind to a package verifier
